Description: Controls which resources can be loaded preventing XSS attacks
Recommended Value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https:
Common Mistakes: Using 'unsafe-eval' when not needed, blocking legitimate CDN resources

Description: Forces browsers to use HTTPS for all future requests
Common Mistakes: Setting max-age too low, forgetting includeSubDomains

Description: Prevents your site from being embedded in iframes

Common Mistakes: Forgetting to set this header entirely

Description: Enables browser XSS filter (legacy but still useful)
Common Mistakes: Relying on this instead of CSP

Description: Controls how much referrer information is sent
Common Mistakes: Using unsafe-url which leaks full URL, not setting at all

Description: Restricts which browser features can be used
Common Mistakes: Allowing features you don't actually need

Description: Isolates browsing context from cross-origin documents
Controls which origins can load your resources
Common Mistakes: Blocking legitimate CDN or third-party resources
